notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Yongfeng Yang and Songjie Zhang contributed equally to the work and wrote the main manuscript txt and prepared figures. Ning Li, Hongli Chen, Hongfang Jia, and Xiaoning Song were responsible for sample collection, chemical composition analysis and data analysis. Guoshun Liu, Chao Ni, and Zhizhong Wang managed the tobacco growth and prepared samples. Huifang Shao discussed the data. Songtao Zhang was corresponding author and responsible for the experimental design. All authors reviewed the manuscript.
